edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.asymmetricCrypto.digitalSignature

Interface RSABasedSignature

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DigitalSignature, MacSignSecLevel, OneTime, SecurityLevel, UnlimitedTimes
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BcRSAPss, CryptoPPRSAPss, OpenSSLRSAPss, RSAPssAbs

    public interface RSABasedSignature
extends DigitalSignature, UnlimitedTimes
    General interface for RSA PSS signature scheme. Every concrete implementation of RSA PSS signature should implement this interface. The RSA PSS (Probabilistic Signature Scheme) is a provably secure way of creating signatures with RSA.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.asymmetricCrypto.digitalSignature.DigitalSignature

        generateKey, generateKey, getAlgorithmName, getPublicKey, isKeySet, setKey, setKey, sign, verify
